lyric:
[00:00.200]When I go outside I feel the sunlights.
[00:06.050]Could it be too late for me to come back down?
[00:11.620]When I see your face I know it's alright.

tlyric:
[by:北极之光mix]
[00:00.200]当我外出时我感受到阳光拂面
[00:06.050]可我是否回来得太晚了？
[00:11.620]当我看到你熟悉的脸，我知道已安然无恙
